sub_title: IT Lead, Software Architect, Programmer, Lean/Agile Practicioner, Speaker
summary:
Throughout my career, I have been leading teams and individuals to achieve their highest performance. I am a proven leader experienced in integrating enterprise vision and strategy with technical teams and consistently deliver value to our customers, external or internal.

I rely on my skills in software development and architecture, innovation and creativity methods, agile and lean approaches, data science and machine learning techniques plus a myriad of strategies to motivate and coach.

I am a continuous (almost obsessed) learner, always aware of new and innovative matters, which I can temper with my experience.

treasury_media.title: Antecipando o sucesso de uma arquitetura de software emergente em times ágeis
treasury_media.description: Arquitetura de Software é central para a qualidade do seu projeto e você sabe que ela vai emergir durante as iterações. Tem certeza? Quais as chances da arquitetura de software dar certo no seu time ágil? Esta palestra mostrará alguns destes indicadores e em que grau eles podem determinar como a arquitetura de software comportar-se-á iterativamente

projects.title: Bobinometro
projects.description:
Improvements in the spooling system in the Logistics area, aimed at estimating the consumption of paper per user of the Moderninha Pro machine and opening replacement orders for these. 

Studies were made considering average usage, churn and the increase of customers. With the improvements suggested, a reduction of 40% on orders was achieved.

projects.title: B2C portal
projects.description:
We joined the dotcom bubble in 1999 to build a B2C solution using classic ASP plus SQL Server. Long before PAAS was a buzzword, our portal would allow any company to use it on the web.

It was comprised usual shopping cart, customer analytics, products inventory and a fully customizable reporting module.

projects.title: Caixa's Festival
projects.description:
Caixa is a bank acting as the main agent of public policy of the federal government. They hold yearly a B2C website that enables customers to find houses/apartments affordable to them.
We were invited to build the website due to our expertise on the area and it was a huge success. The key point here was to design a portal that was scalable given the peaks of traffic.

partner at Urban Arts

projects.title: ERP Solution
projects.description:
Consist was very well known by its mainframe ERP solution and a team was assembled to migrate this solution to a client server solution.
It was designed using natural in the server, delphi as the client and, to manage client-server interactions, a CORBA middleware written in C.

One of the challenges was the decision to use Delphi, which, at the time, was in version 1.0. This was a rewarding opportunity to learn a language from the ground up, includind interacting with Borland engineers.

projects.title: Main portal
projects.description:
Imovelweb is the largest brazilian website for real state businesses. Back in 2002, it was done is classic asp and sql server. My first major project in the company was the relaunch of the site using asp.net.
Our team, lead by me, was responsible for all the software design and coding. It was an amazing opportunity to build from the ground up a whole platform: that included source control management, deployment capabilities, instrumentation, seo optimization.

profile_positions.title: IT Lead
Head of Data Science

profile_positions.description:
At PagSeguro, I have two roles. 
I am the Product Owner for the Risk R&D team. As a PO, I support the team to find the right balance between developing new features and pay technical debt, and work with them to prioritize the activities that have the most impact to our organization. Also, I work closely to the software engineers to enforce they build and deliver what we committed to our stakeholders, taking into account maintainability, product vision, architecture and performance.
Also, I am the Agile Master for the Risk and Modelling area. As an AM, I keep abreast of product developments and how the Risk and Modelling area must be involved. Further, I help people to explore their own mindsets and support the teams during their journey towards the goals, providing specialized knowledge and a lean approach to challenges.
